bond

Class SpyAgent

  • Object
    • bond.SpyAgent

  • public class SpyAgent
extends Object

    Class representing an agent which can modify the behavior of spy points.

    A SpyAgent should be deployed to a specific spy point using Bond.deployAgent(String, SpyAgent). Then, the agent will have the opportunity to examine the observation associated with the spy point, decide if it is applicable or not (based on filters), and if it is, what action to take (doers, results, exceptions). You can specify the behavior of a SpyAgent using a builder pattern:

    
   SpyAgent agent = new SpyAgent()
                      .withFilterKeyContains("key", "substring")
                      .withFilterKeyContains("key2", "substring")
                      .withResult("agent result");
   Bond.deployAgent("mySpyPoint", agent);

   // elsewhere ...

   SpyResult<String> str =
     Bond.obs("key", "substring").obs("key2", "substring").spy("mySpyPoint", String.class);
   // str will contain "agent result"

   SpyResult<String> str2 =
     Bond.obs("key", "substring").obs("key2", "foo").spy("mySpyPoint", String.class);
   // str will not contain any value

    The above snippet will create a SpyAgent which only applies to certain observations. Note that all filter criteria must be met for a SpyAgent to apply to a given spy point.

    See Also:
    Bond.deployAgent(String, SpyAgent)

      • withFilterKeyEq

        public SpyAgent withFilterKeyEq(String key,
                                String value)
        Limit the applicability of this agent to spy points whose observations include a key matching key whose value, when converted to a String via toString, equals value.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to look for in the observation
        value - Value to match against
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • withFilterKeyContains

        public SpyAgent withFilterKeyContains(String key,
                                      String substring)
        Limit the applicability of this agent to spy points whose observations include a key matching key whose value, when converted to a String via JSON serialization, contains substring. Note that this is the only FilterKey which uses JSON serialization instead of toString.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to look for in the observation
        substring - Substring to search for
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • withFilterKeyStartsWith

        Parameters:

        prefix - Prefix to search for

        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

        suffix - Suffix to search for

      • withFilter

        public SpyAgent withFilter(Filter filter)
        Limit the applicability of this agent to spy points for which filter returns true. The filter will receive a map of all (key, value) pairs in the observation as an argument to its accept method, which it can use to determine applicability.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter object to match against.
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • withFilters

        public SpyAgent withFilters(Filter... filters)
        Specify multiple Filters simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        filters - Set of filters to apply
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern
        See Also:
        withFilter(Filter)

      • withDoer

        public SpyAgent withDoer(Doer doer)
        Add a Doer to this agent. For any spy point which this agent is applicable to, the Doer's accept method will be called with a map of all (key, value) pairs in the observation as an argument
        Parameters:
        doer - Doer to implement custom side effect logic
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • withDoers

        public SpyAgent withDoers(Doer... doers)
        Specify multiple Doers simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        doers - Set of doers to apply
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern
        See Also:
        withDoer(Doer)

        Specify that this agent should throw an exception when a point is spied on that this agent is applicable to.

        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • withException

        public bond.SpyAgent.SpyAgentWithCheckedException withException(Exception exception)
        Specify that this agent should throw a checked exception when a point is spied on that this agent is applicable to.
        Parameters:
        exception - The checked exception to be thrown
        Returns:
        A new agent which maintains all of the properties of the original agent but is marked as containing a checked exception

        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • withSkipSaveObservation

        public SpyAgent withSkipSaveObservation(boolean skip)
        Specify that this agent should override the skipSaveObservation settings when a point is spied on that this agent is applicable to. If true, the observation will not be saved (though other agent actions will still apply); if false, the observation will be saved even if skipSaveObservation was set to true on the call to Bond.spy(java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        skip - Whether or not to skip saving the observation.
        Returns:
        This SpyAgent to facilitate the builder pattern

      • getSkipSaveObservation

        public Optional<Boolean> getSkipSaveObservation()
        Get the value of the skip setting; see withSkipSaveObservation(boolean).
        Returns:
        An absent Optional if no skip setting has been specified, else a present Optional containing the value of the skip setting.
